publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3690 Helen Eadie: European Woman of the Year Award—That the Parliament congratulates Barbara MacLeod, National Organiser of the European Movement Scottish Council, on being a finalist in the UK Woman of Europe 2005 Awards; welcomes this recognition of the vital work undertaken by the European Movement, and supports the organisation in its goals of facilitating informed debate and educating the public in constituencies throughout Scotland about Europe and the European Union. Supported by: Donald Gorrie*

S2M-3690 Helen Eadie: European Woman of the Year Award—That the Parliament congratulates Barbara MacLeod, National Organiser of the European Movement Scottish Council, on being a finalist in the UK Woman of Europe 2005 Awards; welcomes this recognition of the vital work undertaken by the European Movement, and supports the organisation in its goals of facilitating informed debate and educating the public in constituencies throughout Scotland about Europe and the European Union. Supported by: Donald Gorrie
